input_args.text: 'When you say \'the server\' Obama didn\'t know exactly which serial number was associated with this piece of hardware, so you can say it was factual that "Obama himself denied any knowledge of the server". He did not have knowledge of the color of the ribbon cable between the hard drive, he did not know how much memory was associated with it. All he knew was something about the tax payers didn\'t have to cover the cost of the machine. For this he was glad.'
